original_text: If we are being called to account today for an act of kindness shown to a man who was lame and are being asked how he was healed,
korean_text: 만일 병자에게 행한 착한 일에 대하여 이 사람이 어떻게 구원을 받았느냐고 오늘 우리에게 질문한다면

sentences.original_text: If we are being called to account today
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 우리가 오늘 책임을 묻고 있다면

sentences.original_text: for an act of kindness shown to a man
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람에게 보인 친절한 행동에 대해

sentences.original_text: and are being asked how he was healed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 어떻게 낫게 되었는지 질문을 받고 있다면
